cause.description:
The Susan G. Komen for the Cure Breast Cancer 3-Day is a National Philanthropic Project. Taking place in 12 cities throughout the U.S., women and men come together and walk 60 miles in 3 days to raise awareness and raise the funds necessary to eradicate breast cancer. Each walker, like myself, has to raise a minimum of $2,200 in order to participate. Please donate to the following website.
http://www.the3day.org/dallas07/singlaughlove
1. Position #1
cause.mission: benefit Susan G Koman for a cure by raising funds essential for research and outreach programs
cause.name: Breast Cancer 3-Day Walk
